General.Name: Shaanxi Meineng Clean Energy Corp. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shaanxi Meineng Clean Energy Corp.,Ltd. operates as a professional gas operating company in the People's Republic of China. The company invests, constructs, and operates city gas projects, compressed natural gas refueling stations, LNG production plants and refueling stations, coal-to-natural gas production plants, and gas transmission pipelines. It also engages in the gas consulting industry. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Building A, No. 2, Wanda Plaza, Xi'an, China
